sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"想象，幻想"之意。
means: imagination ： 含义广，一般不含贬义。可指认真、带有启发性的想象，也可指凭记忆的想象或凭空想象事物的能力。
fancy ： 指脱离实际的幻想或幻想力，常暗含所想象的东西近乎怪诞的意味。
fantasy ： 指与现实完全脱节，荒诞离谱、稀奇古怪的想象。

sentence.Network_en: A child may not differentiate between his imagination and the real world.
sentence.Network_cn: 儿童可能无法将自己的幻想与真实世界区分开来。

sentence.Network_en: A conservatory offers the perfect excuse to let your imagination run riot.
sentence.Network_cn: 音乐学院让你有充分的理由任想象力自由驰骋。

sentence.Network_en: These poems have helped kindle the imagination of generations of children.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些诗激发了一代又一代孩子的想象力。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 那想象力(Imagination)可就不合格了。世界上有两种人：索取者和给予者。
大学英语精读单词表(第一册) - 豆丁网 ... involve vt. (必须)包括 imagination n. 想像力 learning n. 学习；学问，知识.
-tion后缀 ... coordination 同等,调和,协调 imagination 想象(力),空想 pagination 分页, 标记页数.
...我不这样认为,但是他玩得开心而且发挥了他的想象力.imagination n. 想象,空想,想象的事物You didn’t really see it—it was just your imaginat.

list.abs: 郑容和_百度百科 ... Still in Love（ 依然爱你） Imagine( 想象（imagine）） 100103正式改版为 MBC Eco House.
字典中象字的解释 ... (7) 效法[ follow the example of] (9) 想像[ imagine] (4) 象牙的省称[ ivory].
英语描写人的形容词汇集_百度文库 ... hypocritical 虚伪的 imaginative 富有想象力的 impartial 公正的.
人教版高中英语必修5单词表_百度知道 ... &concise adj. 简明的 &imaginative adj. 富于想象力的 &idiomatic adj. 惯用的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French from Latin imaginatio(n-), from the verb imaginari 'picture to oneself', from imago, imagin- 'image'

entry.def: Your imagination is the ability that you have to form pictures or ideas in your mind of things that are new and exciting, or things that you have not experienced.

example.ex: Antonia is a woman with a vivid imagination...
example.tran: 安东尼娅是个想象力丰富的女人。

example.ex: Alistair had a logical mind, and little imagination...
example.tran: 阿利斯泰尔逻辑思维能力很强,但缺乏想象力。

entry.def: Your imagination is the part of your mind which allows you to form pictures or ideas of things that do not necessarily exist in real life.

example.ex: Long before I ever went there, Africa was alive in my imagination.
example.tran: 早在我真正踏足之前很久,非洲就已在我的脑海中活灵活现了。

entry.tran: 吸引…的注意力;摄人魂魄;引人入胜
entry.def: If you say that someone or something captured your imagination, you mean that you thought they were interesting or exciting when you saw them or heard them for the first time.

example.ex: Italian football captured the imagination of the nation last season.
example.tran: 上个赛季意大利足球吸引了全国上下的注意。

entry.def: If you say that something stretches your imagination, you mean that it is good because it makes you think about things that you had not thought about before.

example.ex: Their films are exciting and really stretch the imagination.
example.tran: 他们的电影非常精彩且发人深省。

means.word_mean: 1. the formation of a mental image of something that is not perceived as real and is not present to the senses;

sentences.sentence: "popular imagination created a world of demons"
"imagination reveals what the world could be"

means.word_mean: 2. the ability to form mental images of things or events;

sentences.sentence: "he could still hear her in his imagination"

means.word_mean: 3. the ability to deal resourcefully with unusual problems;

auth_sentence.content: Doesn't leave much to the imagination does it?
auth_sentence.res_content: Doesn't leave much to the imagination does it?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Doesn't leave much to the imagination does it?

auth_sentence.content: Its wealth of imagination is not to be missed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Its wealth of imagination is not to be missed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Its wealth of imagination is not to be missed.

auth_sentence.content: The fecundity of his musical imagination simply beggars belief.
auth_sentence.res_content: The fecundity of his musical imagination simply beggars belief.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The fecundity of his musical imagination simply beggars belief.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"行为,过程,结果"; 2. 注：如果加在y结尾的单词后通常为去掉y加上ication.

stems_affixes.word_buile: revoc=revoke废除+ation行为,过程,结果→n.废弃,取消

stems_affixes.value_cn: 结合,联合;化合;团体;组合数码
stems_affixes.word_buile: combine联合+ation行为,过程,结果→n.结合,联合;化合;团体;组合数码
confirm证实+ation行为,过程,结果→n.证实,确定;确认
determine决心+ation行为,过程,结果→n.决心;决定;确定
excite使兴奋+ation行为,过程,结果→n.刺激;激动;激发
exclaim叫喊;感叹+ation行为,过程,结果→n.叫喊;感叹
ex出去+plan明白+ation行为,过程,结果→使其明白→解释,解说
generalize一般的+ation行为,过程,结果→n.一般化;概括,综合

stems_affixes.value_cn: 想象[力];空想,幻觉;想象出来的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: imagine设想+ation行为,过程,结果→n.想象[力];空想,幻觉;想象出来的事物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 倾斜,弯曲,倾度,倾向,爱好
stems_affixes.word_buile: incline倾斜;偏向+ation行为,过程,结果→n.倾斜,弯曲,倾度,倾向,爱好
lament悲伤,哀悼+ation行为,过程,结果→n.悲痛,哀悼,痛哭
limit限制+ation行为,过程,结果→n.限制,局限性
oblige迫使,责成+ation行为,过程,结果→n.义务,责任
present赠送+ation行为,过程,结果→n.介绍;赠送;呈现
provoc=provoke激怒+ation行为,过程,结果→n.激怒
recommend赞扬;推荐+ation行为,过程,结果→n.推荐,介绍[信],劝告,建议
represent描述,表示+ation行为,过程,结果→n.描写;陈述;代表

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保留,保留意见;预定,预订
stems_affixes.word_buile: reserve保留,储备;预定+ation行为,过程,结果→reservation保留
starve使饿死+ation行为,过程,结果→n.饥饿

Sentence.sentence: Your creative imagination is what you use to make sense of your experiences.
But when a grassy area was planted with bushes, the children got much more into fantasy play, and the social hierarchy was now based on imagination and creativity.
Space exploration has always been the province of dreamers: The human imagination readily soars where human ingenuity (创造力)struggles to follow.
imagination is the mother of invention
They rely heavily on their own imagination.

sentences.en: The story shows plenty of imagination.
sentences.cn: 这个故事表现出丰富的想像力。

means.word_mean: 想像出来的东西, 幻想物

sentences.en: Her pains are mostly pure imagination.
sentences.cn: 她的疼痛多半是纯粹想像出来的东西。

jushi.english: My son has a rich imagination.
The story shows plenty of imagination.
jushi.chinese: 这个故事表现出丰富的想象力。

jushi.english: Nobody was trying to kill him—that was pure imagination.
jushi.chinese: 没有人要杀他——那纯属空想。
